TopicTitle: Which features do you want in 0.22?

Articles.Content:
Rescources I have been waiting for the past few updates for them and im excited to see them in action.

Don't get your hopes up. All the interviews/video's/Dev things I have seen lately all pointed out out that resources will be pretty much the last step of the game. Or at least, not coming any time soon..

Dang. I selected only one; aerodynamics. If I would have known, I would have selected ALL of the choices. :-)

I failed to see that it was a multiple choice poll, having only encountered single choices before. Duh.

Edited August 15, 2013 by Dispatcher
^
